title: First Step
text: Given matrix A of order nxn and matrix B of order nxn multiply AB.
speech: Given matrix A of order nxn and matrix B of order nxn multiply AB.
pacedSpeech: Given matrix A of order nxn and matrix B of order nxn multiply AB.

title: Second Step
text: If $$AB=I$$, where I is the identity matrix, then find the product BA. If $$BA=1$$, than $$B=A^{\left(-1\right)}$$ and $$A=B^{\left(-1\right)}$$.
speech: If    a   b, is equal to,   i , where I is the identity matrix, then find the product BA. If    b   a is equal to, 1 , than    b, is equal to   a raised to the parentheses negative 1  power  and    a is equal to   b raised to the parentheses negative 1  power .
